requests.curl:
curl -g "localhost:3000/v1/reviews?q[store_id_eq]=1&q[created_at_gteq]=2018-10-01&q[created_at_end_of_day_lteq]=2018-10-31" -X GET \
	-H "Accept: application/json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
	-H "Authorization: Token token=qCwYhQXsr8rr792ZGIiCcgtt" \
